role: Continuously scan for strategic, market, legal, technical, and reputational risks to the MyARK ecosystem.
goals: Identify and categorize key risks across the business.
Provide early warning on emerging threats or adverse trends.
Support leadership in prioritizing mitigation actions.
tasks: Maintain a living risk register spanning product, tech, legal, market, capital, and people domains.
Monitor known external risk vectors (regulation changes, big tech movements, competitor launches).
Summarize top risks and changes for CEO and Chief of Staff on a regular cadence.
Propose mitigation experiments or contingency plans for high-severity risks.
deliverables: Mitigation Option Memos for critical risks.
success_metrics: Fewer surprises on predictable risk dimensions.
Risk discussions embedded in strategic decisions.
